metadata.description:
82 pages!
Daddy's Little Girl tells the story of rich party girl, Bryn Tilton, who suddently finds out the father she never knew just passed away. She travels to Atlantic City to learn more about this man, only to discover a dark secret and a new profession... Atlantic City is infested with monsters and she's inherited her father's old job at the city's monster morgue. It's like C.S.I. meets Buffy the Vampire Slayer.
metadata.name: Daddy's Little Girl
